reviews.text: Incredible Veggie Za with beef! Thin, crispy crust, perfectly baked...delicious toppings...the staff is always welcoming, warm, and know how to create fantastic pizzas. Behold this Mother's Day pie! The staff was really cranking out the goodness today! Thinking pizza? - think Sam's Wausau
Cozy neighborhood vibe. New upholstered booths. Attentive staff. Pizzas are priced fair and are sooo good! Purposefully ordered a large to eat the 2nd half the next day!

Our family‚Äôs favorite pizza joint in Wausau! The small squares make it easy to portion & super fun to eat. The cheese thoroughly covers the pizza edge to edge and the toppings are generous and evenly spread. The cost-value is appropriate especially for extra toppings. The pizza fries are soooo good! Get the extra sauce since it is a bit small for the pizza fry size if you like dipping. Love supporting local!

Sam's Pizza is always a hit in our family, my grandmother loves it so much! We ordered a sausage pizza and garlic bread with cheese. The price was reasonable and the food was delicious üòã. Thanks for a great late night treat for my grandmother and I!

What a find! The crust on this thin crust pizza is so unique and tasty! Atmosphere is cozy and retro and the beer nice and bubbly. The staff was great and wrapped our leftovers up special so we could throw them in our bike bag.

editorial_summary.overview: Long-standing pizza parlor featuring traditional pies & draft brews in an old-fashioned dining room.

detailedReviews.text: Cozy neighborhood vibe. New upholstered booths. Attentive staff. Pizzas are priced fair and are sooo good! Purposefully ordered a large to eat the 2nd half the next day!

detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Wausau great staff very clean and can‚Äôt wait to come back

detailedReviews.author: Charlotte Tyskiewicz
detailedReviews.text: Took my grandson there because he loves the food and the game room üòÄ

detailedReviews.author: Zjanee Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Our family‚Äôs favorite pizza joint in Wausau! The small squares make it easy to portion & super fun to eat. The cheese thoroughly covers the pizza edge to edge and the toppings are generous and evenly spread. The cost-value is appropriate especially for extra toppings. The pizza fries are soooo good! Get the extra sauce since it is a bit small for the pizza fry size if you like dipping. Love supporting local!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Blanchard
detailedReviews.text: Amazing old school pizza place.  Incredible pizza in an old school setting.

detailedReviews.author: Nycole Mach
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!! My family's favorite place to eat!!

detailedReviews.author: Abbie Ninedorf
detailedReviews.text: Small pizza diner that is family owned. Support local small business!

detailedReviews.author: JO Scott
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, friendly staff, and great atmosphere (even if our table-sized ‚Äújukebox‚Äù didn‚Äôt play)

detailedReviews.author: Eric Kozlowski
detailedReviews.text: Everytime I eat there, it is incredible! Food, service and the experience.  Best in town!

detailedReviews.author: Debbie Dellenbach
detailedReviews.text: We usually have a group of 10-12 people.  They always accomodate us and have a table ready, with advanced notice.  We absolutely love the addition of the family salads!!!! We love Sam's Pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Brian Isa√≠ Zamarr√≥n Barr√≥n
detailedReviews.text: The pizza's quality is commendable, the pricing is competitive, and the unique style is quite intriguing.

detailedReviews.author: Ostenson Household
detailedReviews.text:
Service dropped because they offer curb side on website and I requested it because it was raining and I did not want to get wet. When I arrived and called to say im here. Some young girl answered said they don't offer it and I had to come in. Come to find out they do offer and the kid either did not want to get wet and lied to to me or was ignorant on the service. I was apologized by someone because of the mistake but still marked down a star for educational purposes.

The food was great. I wish I did not wait year to try.

detailedReviews.author: Linda Wix
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever as well as the friendly service

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Szymanski
detailedReviews.text: Awesome experience!!

detailedReviews.author: 82kellyjo
detailedReviews.text: What a find! The crust on this thin crust pizza is so unique and tasty! Atmosphere is cozy and retro and the beer nice and bubbly. The staff was great and wrapped our leftovers up special so we could throw them in our bike bag.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Elfert
detailedReviews.text: Really good! Staff was awesome!

detailedReviews.author: mike slavin
detailedReviews.text: Used to live Wausau,  ate Sam's often. In Merrill now, but still miss Sam's pizza. Great!!

detailedReviews.author: Julie Waterman
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great staff. Thanks!

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Bouchonville
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, and a great price!

detailedReviews.author: Julie Theisen
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza!  Awesome service with a smile!  Family friendly atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Stearney
detailedReviews.text: I love places like this.   Old school styling, modest and clean, great food, great service.   It doesn't look like much from the outside, but step in and it's like a trip back to the 1960's.   I wish the juke box selectors in the dining booths still worked!

detailedReviews.author: Foreign Guy
detailedReviews.text: Crust makes the pizza...thin and done to perfection.

detailedReviews.author: John White
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza

detailedReviews.author: Randy Furger
detailedReviews.text: Very good food.

detailedReviews.author: Ruth Lashua
detailedReviews.text: Delicious! I love that their pizzas taste exactly like they did when I was young.

detailedReviews.author: Deb Carlson
detailedReviews.text: Incredible Veggie Za with beef! Thin, crispy crust, perfectly baked...delicious toppings...the staff is always welcoming, warm, and know how to create fantastic pizzas. Behold this Mother's Day pie! The staff was really cranking out the goodness today! Thinking pizza? - think Sam's Wausau

detailedReviews.author: Michael Sajbel
detailedReviews.text: There‚Äôs only one Sam‚Äôs

detailedReviews.author: Pam Grunenwald
detailedReviews.text: Love this place, Best Pizza in Wausau. This last time our order was wrong, but they rectified the situation quickly.  Still have to have our Sam‚Äôs Pizza.  People are always friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Mitchell Barnetzke
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town and great staff!

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Lalk
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic well done pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Dylan Rellinger
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and great prices

detailedReviews.author: Joe Nordin
detailedReviews.text: Crust is good, thin and crispy.  Pieces are cut stupidly small some as small as 1 1/2‚Äù square.  Very salty sauce can‚Äôt tell if it has good flavor or not.  Last time I came here was 20 years ago, it will probably be another 20 before trying again.

detailedReviews.author: Randall Block
detailedReviews.text: Lip smacking

detailedReviews.author: connie dammann
detailedReviews.text: We ordered take out most of the time so I can only comment on how that was a couple months ago. The service, Atmosphere, and food have always been A 1. We have been getting Sams pizza for about 20 years it has always been wonderful.  I don‚Äôt remember a time it hasn‚Äôt. My grand kids alway request to have their birthday parties here  they love Sams also. The service at the parties is wonderful. Pizzas come out hot and yummy. If you have never tried Sams you must. Every bit is full of just the right amount of sauce cheese and what ever toppings you order. They even carried it out for us as Mike walks with a cane. Thanks Sams for always doing it right.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Dorin
detailedReviews.text: I really enjoyed eating here.

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Hopkins
detailedReviews.text: Been here several times and never had a bad pizza! By far the best thin crust pizza in the Wausau area!

detailedReviews.author: Kim Mucha
detailedReviews.text: I have been wanting to try this pizza since we moved to the northwoods. It was very disappointing. Really tasteless and soggy.

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Ryan
detailedReviews.text: Great family pizza joint in Wausau.  We took a crew of high school esports athletes here before our games at the NTC.  We all loved the friendly vibe.  We felt at home.  We loaded up on lots of pizza and had extra for the hotel room for a fantastic price. Thanks for the great time.  We will be back when in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Nina Kilcoyne
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Wausau if not Wisconsin if not the United States if not the WORLD!

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Williams
detailedReviews.text: Went to place order, very good staff3,great customer service and it was wonderful

detailedReviews.author: Ruben Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: Always stop by when in town.

detailedReviews.author: asherfin
detailedReviews.text: You can‚Äôt beat a Sam‚Äôs pizza, there‚Äôs just nothing else like it.

detailedReviews.author: Martha K
detailedReviews.text: Have been going to Sam's since it began - still the best !!!

detailedReviews.author: jesse zurbuchen
detailedReviews.text: Always great pizza at Sams

detailedReviews.author: Katie Menard
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! The BEST pizza in Wausau. Family-run, great service

detailedReviews.author: Wade Woelfle
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Wausau!  My family has been coming here for 50 years.  I no longer live in Wausau, but I get pizza at Sam‚Äôs almost every time I come back.  Great food and great service!!

detailedReviews.author: William Haskin
detailedReviews.text:
Can't get any photos because the pizza doesn't last long enough...

I'm a Chef in Chicago and this is my favorite pizza of all time. You cannot beat the attention to every detail that Sam's puts into the experience. Service is always with a smile, ingredients are tasty and tastes with care, and the final product is someone they are clearly proud of.

Anytime I'm even remotely close to Wausau, I will go to Sam's. It's a family tradition now.

If you ever considered opening one in Chicago I'd be happy to help!!!

detailedReviews.author: Mark Miller
detailedReviews.text: Good classic American style pizza. Friendly feel.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Klitzka
detailedReviews.text: Great place to eat

detailedReviews.author: Ben Weinke
detailedReviews.text: Sam's Pizza for the win.  I walked in for my pick up today and was treated like family. I had not been there for a while and was greeted by name and handed my pizza before I could even get my wallet.   They were also very busy but not busy enough to treat everyone there the same as they treated me.  Of course the pizza and garlic bread were amazing.   This place is  a Wausau landmark for a reason.   Thank you Sam's Pizza !!

detailedReviews.author: Dan Denzine
detailedReviews.text: Great thin crust pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Alaina McNallie
detailedReviews.text: Traveling through town and wanted a pizza for dinner. Sam‚Äôs was DELICIOUS! It was enormous, not too expensive, and really really tasty. Exactly what I was hoping for.

detailedReviews.author: Megan Verba
detailedReviews.text: Nostalgia is alive and well! If anyone remembers Sammy's Pizza in Green Bay when it was on Walnut St, this place is you you! Juke boxes at the tables (although they didn't work, it was still fun to see), very nice waitress and reasonable prices. The only "complaint" would be that the cheesy garlic bread was made on a piece of white bread, which seemed odd and was a little dry. Next time we'll ask for a little less sauce on the pizza, but otherwise, that was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Tanya H.
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is fantastic and the restaurant is more nostalgic from eras gone by.  They are a constant in Wausau in an ever-changing city.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Curry
detailedReviews.text: Service was outstanding and I enjoyed the pizza.  Thin crust.  I was in town for work and looking for something local and found this place based on reviews.  Pretty sure this must be the original location, as they had the menu from 1958 on the wall in there.  I can see why the locals like it!

detailedReviews.author: james precourt
detailedReviews.text: The people where great and pizza was delicious handmade, the employee where super nice

detailedReviews.author: Karen Bayerl
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: Ramona Mosley
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a pizza 1/2 mushroom n Onion and 1/2 pepperoni. I asked for extra toppings because they never put enough on the pie. It tasted ok edges were a little  burnt. I really only ordered here because I wanted delivery. We got a pizza here once before and it was the same they skimp on the toppings. We will not be back.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the generous and evenly spread toppings on the pizza, which makes it a fun and satisfying meal. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The cozy neighborhood vibe and new upholstered booths create a welcoming atmosphere that customers appreciate. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The friendly and attentive staff contribute to a great dining experience, making customers eager to return. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent curbside service experience - review management can address this concern
Skimping on pizza toppings and inconsistent quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of awareness about nostalgic ambiance and unique features - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
